=======

>>>>>>> 09665636ba9818fc952cd8bfe693d791912356d2

## Usage

```js
<<<<<<< HEAD
var rgbHex = require('rgb-hex');

rgbHex(65, 131, 196);
//=> 4183c4
=======
const rgbHex = require('rgb-hex');

rgbHex(65, 131, 196);
//=> '4183c4'

rgbHex('rgb(40, 42, 54)');
//=> '282a36'

rgbHex(65, 131, 196, 0.2);
//=> '4183c433'

rgbHex(40, 42, 54, '75%');
//=> '282a36c0'

rgbHex('rgba(40, 42, 54, 75%)');
//=> '282a36c0'
>>>>>>> 09665636ba9818fc952cd8bfe693d791912356d2
```
